directions: Combine first 7 ingredients in a large bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Set aside 1/2 cup marinade, turning to coat well. Cover with plastic, refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
Preheat oven to 350°F. Transfer chicken to baking sheet. Season with salt. Bake until tender and crusty, turning and basting with reserved marinade, about 1 hour.
ingredients: 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro
title: Chicken Wings with Curry-Yogurt Glaze
